title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – NFL biz booming; Franchise tag future; Young QB's ceilings/floors; AFC West O/U's; Middlekauff Mailbag
itunes:title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – NFL biz booming; Franchise tag future; Young QB's ceilings/floors; AFC West O/U's; Middlekauff Mailbag
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.

In this episode, Middlekauff explains looks at the continued signs that the NFL business is booming, the future of the franchise tag; the floors and ceilings for the young NFL QB's. He also gives his AFC West O/U picks and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
